html:
Experienced in producing copy for finance, technology, and fashion industries to effectively communicate products and services to targeted consumers.
  • Written press releases to maximize company exposure and facilitate corporate announcements to media outlets
    • Web Studio Live Launches Complete Web Design in a Browser
    • Charity Golf Classic to Benefit Wounded Veterans
    • Mortgage Servicer Receives Ginnie Mae Approval
  • Delivered clear and consistent brand message to specific audience by producing written content for investor and consumer-focused websites
    • Financial organization website content
    • Web technology application website content
  • Enhanced corporate recruiting efforts by creating advertisements, job descriptions and social media messaging to promote brand growth:
    • Print Ad
    • Online job postings
    • Company LinkedIn
  • Written executive bios and profile features to highlight key individuals
    • Features of severely wounded military veterans
  • Established product identity through naming of property management software
    • RentPointe, software as a service (SaaS)
  • Spearheaded internal communications campaigns geared toward promoting employee wellness, career training, and charitable programs
    • Promotion of Education Portal e-learning software system
    • Promotion of casual dress charity fundraising campaign
  • Produced promotional copy for charity events to increase awareness, volunteerism and fundraising efforts, resulting in over $4 million raised for a variety of non-profit organizations since 2011
    • Charity Golf Tournament magazine
    • Marketing content for charitable organization
    • Marketing content for charity golf tournament
  • Written informational, how-to lifestyle articles and guides for consumers
    • Learn How to Treat the Sun Well
    • Stay Organized, Stick to Your Resolutions
    • Is Your Major Degree a Major Mistake?
    • Teen Career Advice: It’s Never Too Early
  • Experienced in utilizing email marketing providers, Customer Relationship Management and Content Management Systems to deliver communications to client base, including:
    • Blackbaud
    • Mailchimp
    • Umbraco
    • Microsoft SharePoint
  • Employed creative writing skills to create product descriptions and advertisements for Etsy handmade fashion accessories
    • Product descriptions, Live in the Loop Shop
